Module downfall
Package downfall.util

Class Configurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • downfall.util.Configurator
  • public class Configurator
extends java.lang.Object
    Non Instantiable configurator class that is responsible for loading, and storing the Configuration of the program.

        public void loadAndApplyRules​(java.lang.String pathname)

        pathname - pathname to rules to be loaded and applied

        NOT a lightweight accessor method
        Parameters:
